eys3d.depthAccuracy package¶

Submodules¶

eys3d.depthAccuracy.depthAccuracy module¶

class eys3d.depthAccuracy.depthAccuracy.DepthAccuracy(camera_device)

Bases: object

This class manage the functions related to DepthAccuracy.

The design of this class follow the DepthAccuracyOptions.cpp. User could operate the function to get the accuracy information.

Parameters

camera_device (obj) – The camera_device is CameraDevice.

disable()

Disable depth accuracy function.

To disable the depth accuracy function.

enable()

Enable depth accuracy function.

To enable the depth accuracy function.

Note

Notice that it would not guarantee the performance.

get_groundTruth_distance()

Get distance of the ground truth.

[EYS3D][TODO][DOC]

Returns

The ground truth distance that was set by user.

Return type

int

get_region_ratio()

Get the region ratio.

[EYS3D][TODO][DOC]

Returns

The ratio of region that was set by user.

Return type

float

is_enabled()

To check the status.

Check the accuracy status.

Returns

The return value. True for enable, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

set_groundTruth_distance(ground_truth)

Set the ground truth distance to calculate.

[EYS3D][TODO][DOC] The unit is millimeter.

Parameters

ground_truth (int) – The distance to the ground truth object in millimeter (mm).

set_region_ratio(region_ratio)

Set the region ratio.

[EYS3D][TODO][DOC]

Parameters

region_ratio (float) – The ratio of region to calculate.
